name: You vs Zombies
description:
Watch trailer here:

As a lone survivor after a apocalipse you find yourself in a mysterios world including forests,cities,lakes,desert and a lot of terrifying places where you must to stay alive.

Why?Because there are only zombies and it is not one but tens of zombies.

Explore and survive in this amazing and terrifying open-world in first person survival post apocalyptical horror zombie simulator.

Game is very good optimisated

GAME MADE IN GAMEGURU
